title: Mktg Manager Interview
Interview Descriptions: Assessment divided in two parts: functional and general, you must submit a questionnaire, then complete the task and assessment, eventually there is going to be a election day, in which all the committee will vote for your election and upgrade
Interview Questions: Why are you applying For this position?

title: IR Manager Interview
Interview Descriptions: It's really easy, you have to send the application, then there's the interview in which you state your program for the following semester. In the end, there's an election inside the committee to choose between the various applicants
Interview Questions: What is your monthly routine as an IR Manager?

title: IT Specialist Interview
Interview Descriptions:
It was a 3 steps interview. Very interesting and with challenging problem solving quiz. 
It was mainly based on knowing my technical and interpersonal skills .
My job interview was about the It job position, and having an engineering background helped me quite a lot for overtaking the quiz.
Interview Questions: What would you do to solve a client issue of which  you  don’t know the process?

title: Global Volunteer Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at AIESEC (Milan) in Apr 2019
Interview Descriptions: Mi è stato chiesto di esporre le mie motivazioni personali e professionali nel candidarmi nell'esperienza, raccontando esperienze di leadership e i valori in linea con il programma. Inoltre mi è stato chiesto cosa potessi aggiungere io come valore aggiunto per il progetto.
Interview Questions: Ad esempio: Cosa sono gli SDGs?

title: Marketing Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at AIESEC
Interview Descriptions: Some questions related to yourself, future goals, who is your mentor, your skills, past experiences everything is informal and very easy. Just be yourself and try to explain why you would like to join AIESEC.

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at AIESEC (Rome) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: The interview was very good managed and it wasn't difficult. It happened on Skype and they told me their answer just 4 days after the interview! And of course I've been selected

title: Ogv Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at AIESEC (Milan) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: Case study, email sample writing, English speaking interview, simulation of situations, review of the cv, experiences at university.  Area of preference, level of English, knowledge of a second language, level of knowledge of the company and the core values, the different areas
Interview Questions: What are the values of the company?

title: Team Member Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 6 days. I interviewed at AIESEC (Milan)
Interview Descriptions:
Very easy - general questions 
They asked me questions in order to get to know me better. Their aim was to understand my international perspective and my skills to be involved in the organization

title: Team Member Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at AIESEC
Interview Descriptions: Informal interview, purely motivational. After completing the interview, it may take a while for them to answer back, as they usually have only 2 recruiting sessions per year. When the session does come, you will be asked to participate in a weekend of induction, and then you can start working as an effective team member.
Interview Questions: Main questions include Why AIESEC, why this area, where do you see yourself in five year, what is your greatest achievement.

title: EP Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at AIESEC (Bologna) in Oct 2015
Interview Descriptions: Aiesec people are friendly so the interview process is very relaxed. They ask you very easy question about your skills and expectation for your future insiede the organization. My interviewer was very kind and she answered me to all the questions I made about them. no stess. I got a feedback immediatly the same night of the interview. I raccomand to apply for some position in aiesec because the atmosphere is very young and friendly.
Interview Questions: 3 good thing about your personality and 3 downfall
